step.datasource:
SELECT cg.cmp_wwn, ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man, ct.ESE_cnt_id as textfield5, check_isMain as MainContact, ct.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
WHERE 1=1 AND ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id)

SELECT TOP (10) ctg.cnt_id ,cg.cmp_wwn ,ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man ,CONVERT(varchar(50),ct.ESE_cnt_id) as textfield5 ,check_isMain as MainContact ,CONVERT(bit,CASE WHEN ctg.cnt_id = cg.cnt_id THEN ctg.active_y WHEN ISNULL(a.available, 0) = 1 THEN ctg.active_y -- cant change when linked to address ELSE ct.ESE_active END) as active_y -- when maincontact you can't edit this ,ct.[cnt_f_name] ,ct.[cnt_l_name] ,ct.[cnt_m_name] ,ct.[FullName] ,ct.[Initials] ,ct.[Gender] ,ct.[predcode] ,ct.[cnt_job_desc] ,ct.[cnt_dept] ,ct.[taalcode] ,ct.[cnt_f_ext] ,ct.[cnt_f_fax] ,ct.[cnt_f_tel] ,ct.[cnt_f_mobile] ,ct.[cnt_email] --,ct.[cnt_note] ,ct.[cntp_Directory] ,ct.[ContactChange] ,ct.datefield1 ,ct.datefield2 ,ct.datefield3 ,ct.datefield4 ,ct.datefield5 ,ct.textfield1 ,ct.textfield2 ,ct.textfield3 ,ct.textfield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield1) as yesnofield1 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield2) as yesnofield2 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield3) as yesnofield3 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield4) as yesnofield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield5) as yesnofield5 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield1) as numberfield1 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield2) as numberfield2 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield3) as numberfield3 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield4) as numberfield4 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield5) as numberfield5 ,getdate() as DateModified FROM [absc_data].dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
-- Check if contact exists in Addresses because we can't change active status if its there OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP (1) 1 available FROM [400].dbo.Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE a.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id) a
WHERE 1=1 AND CAST((SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT ContactPerson FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses WHERE Type='INV' AND Addresses.ContactPerson=ctg.cnt_id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tinyint) = 0 -- 05.301.350 dont update INV contact AND (cg.cmp_status = 'A') AND (cg.cmp_type = 'C') -- only active customers AND (ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts OR ctg.active_y = 1) AND ct.ESE_sysmodified > ctg.sysmodified -- modified
--AND ctg.cnt_id = '0DAA660C-8389-47A7-966A-12978BB26623' --AND LEN(ct.cnt_job_desc) < 20
ORDER BY check_isMain DESC, ct.ESE_sysmodified

SELECT ctg.cnt_id, cg.cmp_wwn, check_isMain as MainContact ,ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man, CAST(ct.ESE_cnt_id as varchar(255)) as textfield5 ,ct.ESE_cmp_code,ct.cnt_f_name,ct.cnt_l_name,ct.cnt_m_name ,ct.FullName,ct.Initials,ct.Gender,ct.predcode,ct.cnt_job_desc,ct.cnt_dept ,ct.taalcode,ct.cnt_f_ext,ct.cnt_f_fax,ct.cnt_f_tel,ct.cnt_f_mobile,ct.cnt_email ,ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man--,ct.cnt_note --,ct.ESE_active -- cant edit this ,ct.WebAccess ,ct.datefield1,ct.datefield2,ct.datefield3,ct.datefield4,ct.datefield5 ,ct.numberfield1,ct.numberfield2,ct.numberfield3,ct.numberfield4,ct.numberfield5 ,ct.YesNoField1,ct.YesNoField2,ct.YesNoField3,ct.YesNoField4,ct.YesNoField5 ,ct.textfield1,ct.textfield2,ct.textfield3,ct.textfield4--,ct.ESE_textfield5 ,ct.cntp_Directory,ct.ContactChange ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as datemodified -- update modified date FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code -- Select the first created for the criteria, to eliminate duplicates (for main account) CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [400].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id ORDER BY ctg.syscreated ASC) as ctg --INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) -- ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [400].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
WHERE 1=1 AND (ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts OR ctg.active_y = 1) AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only --AND ct.ese_cmp_code = 972291 --AND ct.ESE_sysmodified > ctg.sysmodified -- modified --AND ctg.cnt_id = '5E9D5B61-0640-42BA-9134-0007D435157A' EXCEPT --UNION ALL SELECT ESE_cnt_id as cnt_id, cg.cmp_wwn, check_isMain as MainContact ,ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man, ct.ESE_textfield5 as textfield5 ,ct.ESE_cmp_code COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_f_name COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_l_name COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_m_name COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,ct.FullName COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.Initials COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.Gender COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.predcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_job_desc COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_dept COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,ct.taalcode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_f_ext COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_f_fax COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_f_tel COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_f_mobile COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.cnt_email COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man--,ct.cnt_note COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT --,ct.ESE_active -- cant edit this ,ct.WebAccess ,ct.datefield1,ct.datefield2,ct.datefield3,ct.datefield4,ct.datefield5 ,ct.numberfield1,ct.numberfield2,ct.numberfield3,ct.numberfield4,ct.numberfield5 ,ct.YesNoField1,ct.YesNoField2,ct.YesNoField3,ct.YesNoField4,ct.YesNoField5 ,ct.textfield1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.textfield2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.textfield3 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,ct.textfield4 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT--,ct.ESE_textfield5 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,ct.cntp_Directory,ct.ContactChange ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as datemodified -- update modified date FROM _AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson_400 ct WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [400].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man WHERE 1=1 --AND ct.ESE_cnt_id = '5E9D5B61-0640-42BA-9134-0007D435157A' --AND ct.ese_cmp_code = 972291 ORDER BY MainContact DESC -- first set main

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn, ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man, ct.ESE_cnt_id as textfield5, check_isMain as MainContact, ct.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
WHERE 1=1 AND ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id)

SELECT TOP (10) ctg.cnt_id ,cg.cmp_wwn ,ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man ,CONVERT(varchar(50),ct.ESE_cnt_id) as textfield5 ,check_isMain as MainContact ,CONVERT(bit,CASE WHEN ctg.cnt_id = cg.cnt_id THEN ctg.active_y WHEN ISNULL(a.available, 0) = 1 THEN ctg.active_y -- cant change when linked to address ELSE ct.ESE_active END) as active_y -- when maincontact you can't edit this ,ct.[cnt_f_name] ,ct.[cnt_l_name] ,ct.[cnt_m_name] ,ct.[FullName] ,ct.[Initials] ,ct.[Gender] ,ct.[predcode] ,ct.[cnt_job_desc] ,ct.[cnt_dept] ,ct.[taalcode] ,ct.[cnt_f_ext] ,ct.[cnt_f_fax] ,ct.[cnt_f_tel] ,ct.[cnt_f_mobile] ,ct.[cnt_email] --,ct.[cnt_note] ,ct.[cntp_Directory] ,ct.[ContactChange] ,ct.datefield1 ,ct.datefield2 ,ct.datefield3 ,ct.datefield4 ,ct.datefield5 ,ct.textfield1 ,ct.textfield2 ,ct.textfield3 ,ct.textfield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield1) as yesnofield1 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield2) as yesnofield2 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield3) as yesnofield3 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield4) as yesnofield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield5) as yesnofield5 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield1) as numberfield1 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield2) as numberfield2 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield3) as numberfield3 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield4) as numberfield4 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield5) as numberfield5 ,getdate() as DateModified FROM [absc_data].dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
-- Check if contact exists in Addresses because we can't change active status if its there OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP (1) 1 available FROM [400].dbo.Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE a.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id) a
WHERE 1=1 AND CAST((SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT ContactPerson FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses WHERE Type='INV' AND Addresses.ContactPerson=ctg.cnt_id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tinyint) = 0 -- 05.301.350 dont update INV contact AND (cg.cmp_status = 'A') AND (cg.cmp_type = 'C') -- only active customers AND (ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts OR ctg.active_y = 1) AND ct.ESE_sysmodified > ctg.sysmodified -- modified
--AND ctg.cnt_id <> 'fd198218-7797-4caa-b9ff-33acb24cca7d' --AND LEN(ct.cnt_job_desc) < 20
ORDER BY check_isMain DESC, ct.ESE_sysmodified

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn, ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man, ct.ESE_cnt_id as textfield5, check_isMain as MainContact, ct.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
WHERE 1=1 AND ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id)

SELECT TOP (10) ctg.cnt_id ,cg.cmp_wwn ,ISNULL(h.res_id, cg.cmp_acc_man) as cnt_acc_man ,CONVERT(varchar(50),ct.ESE_cnt_id) as textfield5 ,check_isMain as MainContact ,CONVERT(bit,CASE WHEN ctg.cnt_id = cg.cnt_id THEN ctg.active_y WHEN ISNULL(a.available, 0) = 1 THEN ctg.active_y -- cant change when linked to address ELSE ct.ESE_active END) as active_y -- when maincontact you can't edit this ,ct.[cnt_f_name] ,ct.[cnt_l_name] ,ct.[cnt_m_name] ,ct.[FullName] ,ct.[Initials] ,ct.[Gender] ,ct.[predcode] ,ct.[cnt_job_desc] ,ct.[cnt_dept] ,ct.[taalcode] ,ct.[cnt_f_ext] ,ct.[cnt_f_fax] ,ct.[cnt_f_tel] ,ct.[cnt_f_mobile] ,ct.[cnt_email] --,ct.[cnt_note] ,ct.[cntp_Directory] ,ct.[ContactChange] ,ct.datefield1 ,ct.datefield2 ,ct.datefield3 ,ct.datefield4 ,ct.datefield5 ,ct.textfield1 ,ct.textfield2 ,ct.textfield3 ,ct.textfield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield1) as yesnofield1 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield2) as yesnofield2 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield3) as yesnofield3 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield4) as yesnofield4 ,CONVERT(bit,ct.yesnofield5) as yesnofield5 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield1) as numberfield1 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield2) as numberfield2 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield3) as numberfield3 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield4) as numberfield4 ,CONVERT(decimal,ct.numberfield5) as numberfield5 ,getdate() as DateModified FROM [absc_data].dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_ContactPerson ct WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = ct.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = ct.ESE_cnt_id
-- Check if manager exists, conversion from old nr to new is done in view LEFT JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.emp_type IN ('E','C','S','T') AND h.emp_stat = 'A' AND h.res_id = ct.ESE_cnt_acc_man
-- Check if contact exists in Addresses because we can't change active status if its there OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP (1) 1 available FROM [400].dbo.Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE a.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id) a
WHERE 1=1 AND CAST((SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT ContactPerson FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses WHERE Type='INV' AND Addresses.ContactPerson=ctg.cnt_id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tinyint) = 0 -- 05.301.350 dont update INV contact AND (cg.cmp_status = 'A') AND (cg.cmp_type = 'C') -- only active customers AND (ct.ESE_active = 1 -- only active contacts OR ctg.active_y = 1) AND ct.ESE_sysmodified > ctg.sysmodified -- modified
--AND ctg.cnt_id <> 'fd198218-7797-4caa-b9ff-33acb24cca7d' --AND LEN(ct.cnt_job_desc) < 20
ORDER BY check_isMain DESC, ct.ESE_sysmodified
